landing.heroSubtitle: We train company employees to effectively use ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney and other AI tools. Increase your team's productivity by 3x.
landing.servicesSubtitle: Comprehensive solutions for your business digital transformation
landing.service1Desc: Practical trainings for teams of any size. From basics to advanced prompt engineering.
landing.service2Desc: Process audit and development of an AI implementation roadmap for your company.
landing.service3Desc: We help integrate ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney and other tools into your workflows.
landing.service4Desc: Ready-made prompts for marketing, HR, finance, legal department and other areas.
landing.ceoSectionTitle: I'll Train Your Team to Master AI
landing.ceoBio: Kazakhstan's leading AI mentor with experience training over 1,000 professionals. Conducted 200+ corporate training sessions for top companies in the region. I help businesses master ChatGPT, Claude, and other AI tools in days, not months.
landing.ceoAchievement1Desc: From junior managers to CEOs — I train teams at all levels to work with AI tools
landing.ceoAchievement2Desc: 20+ talks: Digital Bridge, TechWeek Astana, HR Tech Summit, AI Business Forum
landing.ceoAchievement3Desc: Kaspi, Halyk Bank, Air Astana, Beeline, Technodom, Freedom Finance and other market leaders
landing.ceoAchievement4Title: Author of AI Fast Track Methodology
landing.ceoAchievement4Desc: Proprietary training program: from beginner to confident AI user in just 3 days
landing.benefitsSubtitle: Our training programs deliver measurable results
landing.benefit1: Reduce routine tasks by up to 70%
landing.benefit4: Stay ahead of competitors with latest tools
landing.testimonialText: Qoima transformed how our team works. We automated 60% of content creation, and now our employees work confidently with AI.
landing.ctaSectionTitle: Ready to Transform Your Business with AI?
landing.ctaSectionSubtitle: Join 20+ companies that have already boosted their teams' AI competencies with Qoima.
